response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $800,000 to you. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, I propose a purchase price of $750,000. This offer represents a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a remarkable value. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 750000}
